chapters.title: Chapter 6: A Knack
chapters.info: Rhuarc, p. 173—Tall, broad-shouldered, blue-eyed clan chief of the Taardad Aiel. He has gray streaks in his red hair. He has two wives: Amys, a Wise One, and Lian, roofmistress of Cold Rocks Hold. Rand put him in charge of Cairhien along with Berelain, but Cairhien has now been turned over to local government. Rhuarc and many members of his clan brought order (if not precisely peace) to Arad Doman at Rand's command. He has since Traveled with Rand to Tear, and now wears the red headband of the siswai'aman (spears of the Dragon), despite being a clan chief. See also Amys.
